data.title: Maximilian Stuber - Head of Product at Bilendo
data.meta_description: Maximilian Stuber has a diverse work experience across various industries.
data.text:
Maximilian Stuber has a diverse work experience across various industries. Maximilian began their career at Yingli Green Energy Europe GmbH as a Working Student in Finance & Controlling from August 2012 to March 2015. Maximilian then interned at Daimler AG in Procurement/Supplier Management Truck Powertrain from April 2015 to September 2015.

In 2017, Maximilian joined Bilendo GmbH as a Business Development Manager, a position they held until April 2020. From April 2020 to October 2021, they served as a Product Manager at Bilendo. Maximilian's responsibilities expanded as they became a Member of the Board and Head of Product at the company in November 2021.

Additionally, Maximilian Stuber had a brief internship experience at Earlybird Venture Capital as an Intern in the Investment Team from March 2017 to May 2017.

Overall, Maximilian Stuber's work experience demonstrates a progression of roles and increasing responsibilities in product management, business development, finance, and investment.

Maximilian Stuber attended Ludwig-Maximilians-Universität München from 2012 to 2015, where they obtained a Bachelor of Science degree in Economics.
